mapper.insert:
insert into delivery_information( del_flag, supply_company_code, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, apply_delivery_information_code, auditor_by, auditor_time, apply_status, supply_company_name, send_to, send_province_id, send_province_name, send_city_id, send_city_name, send_district_id, send_district_name, sending_address, delivery_days,delivery_type ) values
(#{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.supplyCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyDeliveryInformationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.applyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.supplyCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendDistrictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deliveryDays,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.deliveryType,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.send_to as sendTo, b.supplier_content as sendToName, a.send_province_id as sendProvinceId, a.send_province_name as sendProvinceName, a.send_city_id as sendCityId, a.send_city_name as sendCityName, a.send_district_id as sendDistrictId, a.send_district_name as sendDistrictName, a.sending_address as sendingAddress, a.delivery_days as deliveryDays, a.delivery_type as deliveryType from delivery_information a left join supplier_dictionary_info b on b.supplier_dictionary_name = '发送至' and a.send_to = b.supplier_dictionary_value where supply_company_code = #{supplyCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
